oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: WCKY Hayride - 1949-01-19 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: 1949-01-19 broadcast of WCKY's Hayride program, part 1. Featuring pre-recorded music, hosted by Don Davis, sponsored by Mason's Chicks.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Texas Jim Lewis; Lone Star Cowboys; Rudy Sooter; Mountain Boys; Spade Cooley; Montana Slim
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Wait For The Wagon) -- Opening statement (Don Davis) -- Rolling Along (Texas Jim Lewis and his Lone Star Cowboys) -- Mason's Chicks commercial (Don Davis) -- Hear Dem Bells (Rudy Sooter and his Mountain Boys) -- Mason's Chicks commercial (Don Davis) -- Hollywood Hoedown (Spade Cooley) -- Don Davis introduces Montana Slim -- Cowboy's Airplane Ride (Montana Slim)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WCKY (Radio station : Cincinnati, Ohio); Hayride (Radio program); Davis, Don (WCKY radio station); Lewis, Texas Jim; Lone Star Cowboys (Musical group); Sooter, Rudy; Mountain Boys (Musical group : Rudy Sooter); Cooley, Spade, 1910-1969; Montana Slim, 1904-1996
